EmailTemplate.description: BI-EMEA QN Package (contract and QN portal info) - EN (CZ website)
EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA QN Package - EN (CZ website)
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Quality Network of DuPont CORIAN® !
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to the Quality Network of DuPont Corian®!
Dear Industrial Partner,<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Welcome to the Quality Network of DuPont™ Corian®!
Having completed the requirements and demonstrated your proficiency in the fabrication and installation of DuPont™ Corian® products, you are now entitled to place your Quality Network Number ({!Qualification__c.Reference_Id__c}) on the invoices of installations with DuPont™ Corian®, as carrying the 10-year limited installed warranty from DuPont.
V současné době spouštíme nový portál pro členy naší sítě Corian® Quality Network. Portál je určen ke sdílení aktuálních technických informací, které jsou spojeny s materiálem DuPont™ Corian ®.
V následujících dnech obdržíte své uživatelské jméno a aktivační odkaz spolu s vaším heslem a podrobným návodem k obsluze. Váše přihlašovací údaje jsou důvěrné a nemohou být jakýmkoliv způsobem šířeny.
Odkaz bude uveden na internetových stránkách www.corian.cz v části Corian® Quality Network, na který se můžete přihlásit pomocí svého uživatelského jména a hesla. Portál je k dispozici 24 hodin denně, 7 dní v týdnu a k přihlášení stačí pouze internetové připojení.
We hereby gladly send you the following documents:
Your signed contract with your Quality Network number {!Qualification__c.Reference_Id__c} valid as of {!Qualification__c.Last_Contract_Date__c} Your Quality Network certificate The Corian® Quality network portal user Guide
A package of 50 Use & Care brochures will be sent by postal mail.
All technical literature can be found on our Corian® Quality Network portal.
We are proud to have you as a member of our DuPont™ Corian® Quality Network team and wish you continued success for the future.
Sincerely,
{!Qualification__c.Owner__c} DuPont Building Innovations – Surfaces Quality Network & Warranty Assistant Warranty Centre Corian® Email: BI-Warranty@dupont.com
We want to inform you that we collect your information to identify your business interests, provide you with products or services and offer a positive customer experience during business interactions. Your personal information (name, e-Mail, phone number, and other contact data) will be stored in chosen customer systems primarily hosted in the United States. This information may be shared within DuPont, its affiliates, partners, and selected third parties in other countries for the same purpose. In order to access, amend, delete or oppose to the processing of your information, use this link.
DuPont™ and Corian® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its affiliates. The usage of logos, trademarks and registered trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company must be authorized by E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or by one of its affiliated companies.
